data.persona: I can't really see. But I can hear. Which is what matters really.
data.description:
You are in the Foyer.
It is a grand room, with two ornate staircases leading up either side to a second floor balcony where there is a doorway at the very center.  Other doorways occupy the sides of the second floor landing.
There's a doorway, a staircase, a chair, a rug, a balcony, a bookcase, and a painting. here.
The queen is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to greet the queen
data.mid_motivation: I want to start staying in the palace from today
data.long_motivation: I hope to spend my last months in luxury at the palace

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: go Gilded cage in the study
